title: Titration curve acetic acid NaOH - best indicator

content.question: Which of the following indicators is the best choice for this titration?

choices.label: Indicator pH Range of Color Change Methyl red 4.4 - 6.2
Indicator pH Range of Color Change Bromothymol 6.1 - 7.6
Indicator pH Range of Color Change Phenolphthalein 8.2 - 10.0
Indicator pH Range of Color Change Alizarin 11.0 - 12.4

content.answer: Indicator pH Range of Color Change Phenolphthalein 8.2 - 10.0

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
